LanguageData.Escort.label: escort
LanguageData.Escort.description: Stay near the mechanitor and fight nearby enemies. Follow the mechanitor, even off the map.
LanguageData.Recharge.label: recharge
LanguageData.Recharge.description: Go to rechargers and recharge, even if already well-charged.
LanguageData.SelfShutdown.label: dormant self-charge
LanguageData.SelfShutdown.description: Go into a dormant self-charging state that very slowly regains energy without a recharger.
LanguageData.Work.label: work
LanguageData.Work.description: Work autonomously according to mechanoid type. Automatically go to rechargers and recharge when needed.
